name: Mom (Season 7)
summary: 安娜·法瑞斯和艾莉森·珍妮主演喜剧《极品老妈》宣布续订第7、8季，是否完结未定。
info:
• 中文名: 极品老妈 第七季
  • 放送星期: 星期五
  • 主演: Anna Faris
  • 别名: 母亲大人
  • 别名: 老妈
  • 集数: 20
  • 开始: 2019-09-26
  • 结束: 2020-04-16

eps.name: Audrey Hepburn and a Jalepeño Pepper
eps.desc: While Bonnie struggles to enjoy her perfect honeymoon with Adam, Christy makes some questionable changes at the bar while they’re away.

eps.name: Pop Pop and a Puma
eps.desc: Christy and Adam clash over an incident at the bar, leaving Bonnie in a precarious situation. Also, Jill’s new boyfriend, Andy, has trouble finding a way to impress her.

eps.name: Goat Yogurt and Ample Parking
eps.desc: Christy is asked to perform questionable tasks for her demanding new boss, Veronica, and Bonnie has second thoughts about taking Adam’s last name.

eps.name: Twirly Flippy Men and a Dirty
eps.desc: Christy escorts a reluctant Chef Rudy to court-ordered AA meetings. Also, Bonnie attempts to make Adam feel more at home in the apartment

eps.name: Fake Bacon and a Plan to Kill All of Us
eps.desc: Following the sudden death of a friend, Christy and Bonnie look for ways to honor her memory.

eps.name: Wile E. Coyote and a Pretentious Douche
eps.desc: Christy tries to embrace positivity after having a meltdown. Also, Bonnie gets a glimpse of what Adam was like before his accident.

eps.name: Pork Butt and a Mall Walker
eps.desc: Bonnie and Adam go on a double date with Jill and Andy. Tammy recruits Christy to mediate a sensitive situation with Marjorie.

eps.name: Hot Butter and Toxic Narcissism
eps.desc: Christy regrets fleeing the scene after hitting a parked car. Also, Bonnie’s therapist, Trevor, offers tools to help her better communicate with Adam.

eps.name: Tuna Florentine and a Clean Handoff
eps.desc: Christy and the ladies rally around Tammy when she has trouble adjusting to early release from parole. Also, Bonnie is disappointed when her perfect birthday gift for Adam gets a lukewarm response.

eps.name: Higgledy-Piggledy and a Cat Show
eps.desc: Bonnie is forced to relive painful Christmas memories when Christy recounts tales from her childhood to Bonnie’s sponsee, Patty.

eps.name: One Tiny Incision and a Coffin Dress
eps.desc:
Christy and Bonnie help Tammy with a difficult decision when her long-lost aunt, Cookie (Kathleen Turner), appears with a surprising proposition.
